member.name: T:Maomi.MQ.ConsumerState
member.summary:
Consumer state.
After receiving RabbitMQ messages, ACK, NACK, and put back to the queue are determined by status enumeration.
消费者状态.
接受 RabbitMQ 消息后，通过状态枚举确定进行 ACK、NACK 以及放回队列等.

member.name: F:Maomi.MQ.ConsumerState.Ack
member.summary: ACK.

member.name: F:Maomi.MQ.ConsumerState.Nack
member.summary:
Immediately NACK and use the default configuration to set whether to put the message back on the queue.
立即 NACK，并使用默认配置设置是否将消息放回队列.

member.name: F:Maomi.MQ.ConsumerState.NackAndRequeue
member.summary:
Immediately NACK and put the message back on the queue.
立即 NACK，并将消息放回队列.

member.name: F:Maomi.MQ.ConsumerState.NackAndNoRequeue
member.summary:
Immediately NACK, and the message will be removed from the server queue.
立即 NACK，消息将会从服务器队列中移除.

member.name: F:Maomi.MQ.ConsumerState.Exception
member.summary:
Exception.
出现异常情况.

member.summary:

添加基础服务.

member.name: T:Maomi.MQ.IBasicMessageHandler`1
member.summary: It is only used to define the message and has no meaning at all.

member.name: M:Maomi.MQ.IBasicMessageHandler`1.ExecuteAsync(Maomi.MQ.MessageHeader,`0)
member.summary:
The received message is processed when it has been deserialized correctly.
当消息被正确反序列化后，处理接收到的消息.

member.name: M:Maomi.MQ.IBasicMessageHandler`1.FaildAsync(Maomi.MQ.MessageHeader,System.Exception,System.Int32,`0)
member.summary:
When an exception occurs to ExecuteAsync, execute it immediately.
当 ExecuteAsync 出现异常后，立即执行.
member.param:
An anomaly occurs when consuming.
消费时出现的异常.

Current retry times.
当前重试次数.

member.name: M:Maomi.MQ.IBasicMessageHandler`1.FallbackAsync(Maomi.MQ.MessageHeader,`0,System.Exception)
member.summary:
When all retries fail, or an exception occurs that the ExecuteAsync method cannot be accessed.
当所有重试均失败，或出现不能进入 ExecuteAsync 方法的异常.
member.returns: Determine how the message will be handled.

消息被创建的时间.

member.name: P:Maomi.MQ.MessageHeader.Properties
member.summary:
The message comes with an attribute, which for RabbitMQ is IReadOnlyBasicProperties.
消息附带属性，对于 RabbitMQ 是 IReadOnlyBasicProperties.

member.summary: The content format of the message,ex: "application/json".

member.summary:
The object type,ex: "order".
被序列化传递的对象类型的名称.

member.summary: The message is sent by which application.
